item.description:
on April 7 we are once again going to Designers Circus in Allston. We will leave after meet up at Panera in Dedham and arrive at Designers Circus in Allston at 2:00 p.m. Wine and cheese will be served while shopping the racks at this unique shopping event. Designers Circus sells creative and quality clothing for women who want to be different at discounted prices.

There is no limit on the number of people that can attend. Bring your sisters, neighbors and friends. There is no charge for this event, but we ask that you donate $2.00 to our Mitzvah fund.
item.name: Designers Circus Shopping Event
